Text:

Airing today, according to [h4 TV Listings, is  Episode 13 called '20 Years of Time Team', 5:30PM London Time. And, that's all she wrote.

Hoping DigVillage gets off the ground, or in the ground as it were. Stewart  Paul , Diane Wootten and Mick are already involved.

Well....quite a few
Thanks for sharing this once again, they're hard to come by :)
Got all episodes I think, though some are pretty dodgy video quality. Someone with a full collection should post them sometime. I bet it's already posted somewhere.
